create.table_todo_group: create table todo_group (id varchar primary key,name varchar(255) not null,times integer,category varchar, create_time timestamp,finish_time timestamp);
create.table_todo_item: create table todo_item(id varchar primary key,belong_id varchar,title varchar,description varchar,is_finish integer,weight smallint)
create.new_todo_group: insert into todo_group(id, name, times, category, create_time, finish_time) values ('{}', '{}', {}, '{}', '{}', '{}');

retrieve.todo_group_overview: select todo_group.id, todo_group.name, todo_group.finish_time, todo_group.category from todo_group;
